thread.title: Carer, 29, was texting while autistic man drowned in lake | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Carer, 29, was texting while autistic man drowned in lake | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Taylor For Mailonline
title: Carer, 29, was texting while autistic man drowned in lake | Daily Mail Online
text: Carer, 29, who texted her boyfriend and another man she met online as 'very vulnerable' autistic man drowned in a reservoir is jailed for four months Nikki Deaney was messaging the two men when she was meant to be working Majid Akhtar, who she was caring for, vanished by the King's Mill reservoir His body was found floating face down by two dog walkers in Nottinghamshire Deaney had been on the phone for 19 of the 34 minutes she was meant to be caring for Mr Akhtar who had the mental age of four-years-old She admitted failing to take reasonable care for the health and safety of other persons and was jailed for four months by a judge a Nottingham Crown Court
